name: Scatterplot
author: Daniel Neves
source:
$@input x, expression, expression(1:10), description = "x coordinates for the plot; or structure defining both x and y coordinates."
$@input y, expression, description = "y coordinates for the plot."

$@page Plot Options

  $@input type, choices, "p", choices = list("Points"="p", "Lines"="l", "Both"="b", "Empty Points"="c", "Overplotted"="o", "Stairs (Floor)"="s", "Stairs (Ceiling)"="S"), description = "desired type of plot."

  $@group g1, layout = "flow-3", description = "Shape and color"

  $@input col, expression, "", description = "colors for points and lines."
  $@input pch, expression, 21, description = "plotting characters or symbols."
  $@input cex, expression, description = "size of plotting characters and symbols."

  $@group g2, layout = "flow-2", description = "Labels"

  $@input main, character, description = "main title for the plot."
  $@input xlab, character, description = "label for the x-axis."
  $@input ylab, character, description = "label for the y-axis."

  $@group g3, layout = "flow-2", description = "Limits for the axes"

  $@input xlim, numeric2, NULL, allow.null = TRUE, description = "x limits (x1, x2) for the plot."
  $@input ylim, numeric2, NULL, allow.null = TRUE, description = "y limits (y1, y2) for the plot."

$@page Graphical Options

  $@input mar, numeric4, c(5.1, 4.1, 4.1, 2.1), allow.null = TRUE, description = "margins of the bottom, left, top and right sides of the plot in lines."

$@output Scatterplot, plot

$@if !default(mar)
# set the margins for the plot
par(mar=c(${mar}))
$@end-if

# do the plot
plot(${dn:: x:x, y=y, type=type, pch=pch, col=col, main=main, xlab=xlab, ylab=ylab})

$@end-output
